sentences.sContent: Can you streamline this kind of airship?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you streamline this kind of airship?
sentences.sCn: 你能把这种飞艇设计成流线型吗?。

sentences.sContent: This section introduces new features that will streamline project creation.
sentences.sContent_eng: This section introduces new features that will streamline project creation.
sentences.sCn: 这部分将介绍流线型项目创建的新特性。

sentences.sContent: Even when we streamline our test cases to only those that "should pass, " we can fall into this trap.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even when we streamline our test cases to only those that "should pass, " we can fall into this trap.
sentences.sCn: 即使当我们将我们的测试用例流线处理为那些只“应该通过”的内容时，我们也可能落入该圈套。

words.tran: 流线型的；改进的；最新型的
使成流线型；使合理化（streamline的过去式和过去分词）
